title: Imagine how great this game would be if it was balanced.
body:
Everyone would be nice, and accepting of the fact they lose. Hardly anyone being toxic. The game would actually feel legitimately FUN even if you get stomped. If Riot would start making correct balance choices, they could totally save their game from dying in the future and not having such a bad reputation.


Shame, that's only imagination.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
